loans.name: Alisher

texts.ru:
Пастух, который снято на фотке, это Алишер. Он один из жителей района Дангара. В районе Дангара есть много степь для пасти скота. Алишер занимается животноводством. Он идет по стопам родителей. Алишер уже 7 лет занимается скотоводством. У него имеется стадо овцы. 
Алишеру 39 лет. Он женат и отец четверых детей. У него две дочери и двое сыновья. Жена домохозяйка и не имеет работу. Дети учатся в средней школе. Дочки после школы помогает маме в домашнем хозяйстве. А сыновья помогает папе выращивать скота. Алишер любить домашних животных, и он хочет выращивать других домашних животных. Алишер за счет кредита хочет приобрести несколько крупнорогатого скота и продвигать животноводческую деятельность. Он верит в Вас и на Вашу поддержку.
texts.en:
The shepherd pictured in the photograph is Alisher. He is a resident of the Dangara area. In the Dangara area there are many steppes for pasturing livestock. Alisher breeds livestock. He is following in the footsteps of his parents. Alisher has been breeding livestock for 7 years. He has a flock of sheep. 

Alisher is 39 years old. He is married and has four children. He has two daughters and two sons. His wife is a homemaker, and does not have a job. Their children attend secondary school. Their daughters help their mother with the household chores after school. And their sons help their father to raise the livestock. 

Alisher loves domestic animals, and he wants to breed other domestic animals. Alisher wants to buy some livestock with a loan, and advance his livestock-breeding business. He believes in you and your support.

loans.use: to buy some livestock.

loans.name: Loreta

texts.en:
Loreta is a 61-year-old married woman. She lives in the rural area of Carmen, Bohol with his husband and five grown children. She has raised hogs for almost 10 years. In addition to that, she also engages in vegetable gardening. She grows and sells vegetables. Her husband earns a living by being a carpenters and a farmer also.

She decided to increase his current business but the main issue is insufficient amounts of capital needed to expand. Therefore Loreta is applying for a Kiva loan from its field partner CEVI, because she has to buy vitamins and pig feed and fertilizers for the farm. In this way she would be able to cope with demands. She can use the profit amount as savings to fulfill the future needs as well.

Loreta is very thankful to Kiva and CEVI.

loans.use: to buy vitamins and pig feed and fertilizers for the farm

loans.name: Elma

texts.en:
Elma always has enthusiasm for farming. She has cultivated their rice land in Pagadian and has yielded good earnings doing this type of work.

Recently, she applied for a loan to purchase rice seeds that will have good results in healthier, bigger, and potentially higher-yielding seedlings. This will ensure that the rice field is ready for planting.

Elma knows that she has to get things right to yield more income for this cropping season. In the future, Elma hopes to buy a hauling truck for easy transport of produce.

loans.use: to purchase rice seeds that will have good results in healthier, bigger, and potentially higher-yielding seedlings.

location.town: Pagadian - Pagadian City, Zamboanga del Sur

loans.name: Harun

texts.en:
Harun is 44 years old. He is married and blessed with 3 children.

He has has been selling shoes for the last 2 years and it has been profitable. He has requested for a loan from VisionFund Kenya which he will be using to purchase stock and hopes this will help him to expand the business.

His hopes and dreams for the future are to to open other businesses and live a better life.

loans.use: to purchase stock to help him to expand the business

loans.name: Imelda

texts.en:
Imelda works hard to support her family. Imelda is married and has a buy-and-sell vegetable business in the Philippines.

Imelda requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to buy fruits and vegetables to sell in her food stall.

Imelda has been in this business for eight years now.

In the future, Imelda would like to save enough money so that she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables to sell in her food stall.

loans.name: Sebitoli Chimpanzee Association Group

texts.en: Switzer is a 69 year old married man living in Fort Portal Uganda. He is a farmer who rears cattle,grows food crops like bananas, cassava and sweet potato. He started business in 2000 with a hope of of becoming a self sustainable person. He is faced with challenges of fluctuating input prices that result into buying less inputs and thus low production. However, he has a vision of becoming a model farmer in his area. He applied for a loan in a group of Sebitoli Chimpanzee Association where members guarantee each other in case of borrowing and payment, to help him pay workers who are cleaning his farm and milking his cattle.

loans.use: to pay workers who are cleaning his farm and milking his cattle.

loans.name: Klara

texts.ru: Клара, 52 года, замужем, есть 4 детей. У Клары среднее образование, уже 10 лет она занимается животноводством. Стартовав с 20,000 сом (KGS), благодаря упорному труду, на сегодняшний день у Клары имеется корова, 10 овец.  Ежемесячный доход от бизнеса Клары составляет 12,800 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, она обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) для покупки овец. Доходы от кредита она хочет вложить в приумножение количества домашней скотины и постройку дома.
texts.en:
Klara is 52 years old, married, and has four children. Klara has secondary education, and has been breeding livestock for 10 years. Having started with 20,000 som (KGS), thanks to her persistent hard work, today Klara has a cow and ten sheep. Klara's monthly income from the business is about 12,800 som (KGS). 

With the view of further developing her farm, she has applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 50,000 som (KGS) to buy sheep. She wants to invest the funds from the loan in increasing her livestock herd, and in building a house.

loans.use: to buy some sheep in order to increase her livestock headcount.

loans.name: Orozkul

texts.ru: Орозкул успешно погасила свой кредит, использовав его по назначению. Она благодарна Фонду Кива и всем, кто помог ей в финансировании. На сегодня в хозяйстве Орозкул есть 2 коровы, 5 овец, лошадь, также на арендованном земельном наделе мерою 1,0 Га она занимается полеводством, выращивая картофель. Ежемесячная прибыль Орозкул составляет около 21,000 сомов(KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Орозкул обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку коровы. В будущем Орозкул планирует направлять доходы от кредита на развитие ее сельскохозяйственной деятельности и постройку сараев для скота.
texts.en:
Orozkul has successfully paid off her loan, having used it as specified. She is thankful to Kiva and to everyone who helped her with financing. Today on her farm, Orozkul has two cows, five sheep, and a horse. She also grows crops on a plot of rented land of 1.0 hectares, cultivating potatoes. Orozkul's monthly income is about 21,000 som (KGS). 

With the view of further developing her farm, Orozkul has applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 50,000 som (KGS) to buy a cow. In the future, Orozkul plans to direct the funds from the loan into developing her farming business, and into building barns for the livestock.

loans.use: to buy one cow in order to increase her herd.

loans.name: Ensa

texts.en:
Ensa is very thankful for the previous loan she was given to finally fence in her yard. Her husband is still working as a driver for a private company, earning a low salary and Ensa is now working as contract and travel nurse. Typically, people who are ill and in need of care due to illness call her, such as the elderly or very ill people. She loves what she does and hopes in the future she will be able to have her own small hospital.

At this time, she is requesting a loan to purchase new medical equipment for her business. This loan will help her to not only continue her business, but also provide much better care and services to her clients. She is very grateful for this opportunity and wants to thank the lenders.

loans.use: to purchase new medical equipment for her traveling nurse business.

loans.name: Celina Margarita

texts.es:
Celina, de 20 años estudio bachillerato contador, esta acompañada y su pareja trabaja como motorista, no tiene hijos y nadie depende de ella.

Celina, desde hace 5 años tiene un negocio de venta de ropa y zapatos, este negocio era de su mamá, pero ella se lo dejo cuando tuvo que emigrar a Estados Unidos y desde entonces ella lo administra; antes solo se dedicaba estudiar, su negocio esta a cinco cuadras de su casa y su jornada laboral comienza a las 5:00 a.m. para poder abrir su negocio y comensar a trabajar a las 6:30 a.m. y cierra a las 6:00 p.m.


El prétamo que está solicitando es para comprar ropa y calzado para hombres y mujeres, porque se acercan las fiestas patronales de su municipio y quiere tener variedad de productos para vender más. 

Celina, sueña con tener un local grande de venta ropa y poder compara un vehículo para el uso de su negocio, ademas desea poder construir su propia casa, porque donde vive es de su mamá.
texts.en:
Celina, age 20, studied for an accounting degree. She is in a relationship, and her life partner works as a driver. She does not have children, and no one is dependent upon her. Celina has had a business selling clothes and shoes for five years. This business was her mother's. However, her mother left it to her when she had to emigrate to the United States. Celina has been running it ever since then. Before that she went to school.

Her business is five blocks from her house. Her work day starts at 5:00 a.m. in order to be able to open her business. She starts working at 6:30 a.m. and closes at 6:00 p.m.

The loan that she is requesting is to buy clothes and shoes for men and women. This is because the patron saint festivals for her municipality are approaching, and she wants to have a variety of products in order to sell more.

Celina dreams of having a large place to sell clothes and of being able to buy a vehicle to use for her business. She also wishes to be able to build her own house because she lives in her mother's house.

loans.use: to buy clothes and shoes for men and women.

loans.name: Melt Group

texts.en:
“Stop dreaming and start believing,” is Erica’s inspirational quote that led her through the way. Erica is very passionate about child education and development. Her first step in realizing her dream came about when she acquired a certificate in Early Child Development (ECD). She went on to take part in a pastel Accounting course in 2012 at Speciss College. She is a woman on a definite mission to succeed.
Erica joined a well-established day care centre called Shalom in late 2012 with the main objective of finding out in reality how a child develops as they learn and the experience to work with young minds.

After acquiring much knowledge and experience, she finally opened a pre-school which she named Little Minds pre-school and currently she has 20 pupils. However, Erica regularly faces payment problems with many excuses from the children’s parents. This seriously affects her cash-flows and hindering the improvements that she desires to undertake. She recently purchased a commuter omnibus for the transportation of children which dug deeply into her capital.

She is a member of Melt group and they received training from Thrive on financial management. A loan of $500 will help Erica to improve her pupil’s play-center and some other improvements such as computers. Her dream is to open a junior school in the near future.

loans.use: to improve her pupil’s play-center and buy a computer.

loans.name: Chantha's Group

texts.en: Chantha’s group live in a rural village in Kandal province in Cambodia. Chantha makes a living cultivating rice and she also does extra work as factory laborer to support her family. In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women and man to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for their family.	.

loans.name: Marilou

texts.en:
Marilou lives a simple life with her family in the town of Baybay city. She has three children, two adult and one school-aged child aged 12.

She sells fish from her husband's catch. Hence, her husband is a fisherman. They have been doing this since they started their married life.

Now Marilou is asking for a bigger loan as she wants to buy fishing materials such as fishing net, fishing knot, fishing floats and fishing weights. She will also use the money for their fishing boat repair.

Marilou wants to have enough money to repair their fishing boat so they could have stable earnings.

loans.use: to buy fishing materials such as fishing net, fishing knot, fishing floats and fishing weights, plus fishing boat repair.

loans.name: Pacita

texts.en:
Pacita lives a simple life with her family in a town of Catigbian, Bohol. She is married and has 10 children. Her oldest child is 23 years old while her youngest child is 14 years old. With greater effort, her husband raises them well through their rice farming business; she supports her husband in running this business. Pacita wants a financial stability. With this, she is successfully have her own business.

She has raised pigs for 15 years. And that is the reason why she is asking for a loan. She will buy piglets and feed as well. Definitely, she will also buy fertilizer for their rice farm. In the future, Pacita wants to enhance their livelihood to better means of living in the future.

loans.use: to buy  fertilizer; piglets and feed

loans.name: Rona

texts.en:
Rona is a hardworking woman entrepreneur with three children.

She has a fish vending in the Philippines and requested a PHP 14,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy more fish to sell to customers.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

Rona dreams that one day, She will be able to save enough money so she continue to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell to customers.

loans.name: Kyzylgul

texts.ru: Кызылгуль, 59 лет, замужем, воспитывает 6 детей. У нее среднее образование, после распада колхоза, выделили земельный надел и на протяжении 23 лет она занимается полеводством и животноводством. В хозяйстве есть корова и 20 овец. На 0,50 Га арендованной земли она выращивает картофель, плодовые деревья. Также занимается реализацией овощей и фруктов. Ежемесячная прибыль составляет 16,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Кызылгуль обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 30,000 сом (KGS) на увеличение поголовья скота за счет покупки 2 телят, часть средств направит на покупку удобрений и топлива для полеводства. Кызылгуль является лидером группы "Ак-Пейил", всего в группе - 3 человека. Доходы от кредита она планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение бизнеса и покупку земельного участка.
texts.en:
Kyzylgul is 59 years old, married, and bringing up six children. She has secondary education, and after the collapse of the collective farms, was allocated an allotment of land. For 23 years, she has been growing crops and breeding livestock. On her farm there is a cow and twenty sheep. On 0.50 hectares of rented land, she cultivates potatoes and fruit. She also sells her vegetables and fruit. Her monthly income is about 16,000 som (KGS). 

With the view of further developing her business, Kyzylgul has applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 30,000 som (KGS) in order to increase her livestock headcount through buying two calves. Part of the funds will go into buying fertilisers and fuel for growing crops. Kyzylgul is the leader of the group 'Ak-Peiil', and there are only three people in the group. She plans to invest the funds from the loan in the further augmentation of her business, and in buying a land plot.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, fuel for land cultivation and to purchase two calves.

loans.name: Emma

texts.en:
As a married mother of seven children, Emma works hard to support her family.

Emma has a fish vending business in the Philippines. Emma is borrowing PHP 12,000 through NWTF in order to buy more seafood to sell.

Emma has been sustaining her business activities through her past four loans from NWTF and more recently, through its partnership with Kiva. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so that she can continue to send her children to school and expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more seafood to sell.

loans.name: Mona

texts.en:
Mona is 42, married, and has three daughters and one son. She started a small clothing project to help her husband with the family income. Previously, Mona had requested two consecutive loans and has successfully repaid them on the due dates.

She is requesting a 12,000 loan to buy more clothing to sell to cover her children's increasing expenses.

loans.use: To buy clothing.

loans.name: Marisol Adriana

texts.es: Marisol es una mujer de 35 años de edad que vive junto a su pareja y su bebe en la localidad rural de Lari, que está ubicada en Arequipa. Ella se dedica al cultivo de alfalfa orgánica y a la cría de ganado vacuno orgánico, poniendo siempre mucha atención en el cuidado y en la alimentación que les brinda, que está constituida por la alfalfa orgánica que ella cultiva. Solicita el micro crédito para poder comprar una vaca orgánica, espera poder vender su leche a un mejor precio por ser orgánica. En el futuro espera poder mejorar su casa para poder vivir cómodamente.
texts.en:
Marisol is a 35 year old woman who lives with her partner and their baby in the rural area of Lari, which is in Arequipa. She works farming organic alfalfa and raising organic cattle, and always pays careful attention to caring for them and to the food she gives them, which consists of the organic alfalfa she grows.

She is requesting this micro-loan so that she can buy an organic cow and hopes to be able to sell its milk at a higher price because it is organic. In future, she hopes to be able to improve her house so that she can live comfortably.

loans.use: to buy an organic cow

loans.name: Noyaa 3 Group

texts.en:
These people are all part of the group called Noyaa in Teshie, Accra-Ghana. This part of the city contains citizens who are very friendly and hardworking.

Five dedicated members are together in this group and they are working hard to make their dreams for better lives come true. They are into secondhand clothing, cutlery sets, frying pans, cooking rice and stew, and jewelry.

Abena has two children and is a single woman. In order to provide more income for the family, Abena sells secondhand clothing. She is asking for a loan to buy more secondhand clothing to resell to her customers. This is her eighth loan cycle with ID-Ghana.

They promise to repay the loan without trouble.

loans.use: to buy more secondhand clothing to resell to her customers.

loans.name: Walid

texts.en:
Walid is a 22-year-old single man who works in dairy products production and sales with ten years of experience in this domain.

Walid is the sole breadwinner for his family. He had to quit school during his childhood and work to support his family members.

In 2014, Walid was capable of starting his own business, which today he is working hard to develop through acquiring a YOUTH loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua to purchase a cooling room to expand his working place and increase his production.

He works in wholesale and retail, and he is working hard to expand his working zone as much as he can in the future.

loans.use: to purchase a cooling room to expand his working place and increase his production.

loans.name: Hanaa

texts.en:
Hanaa is a 41-year-old married mother of four children. She works in a clothes factory to support her husband in covering their family's increasing living needs.

Hanna is acquiring a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua to pay her children's school tuition fees.

The loan is part of Al Majmoua's Back-to-School program, designed to finance school expenses such as books, stationery, transportation and fees for students from low income families. Funds can be used for partial or complete payment of school expenses.

By supporting this loan, you're enabling access to education for students with limited options. Hanaa hopes to continue supporting her children's education and improve their living.

loans.use: to pay for her children's school tuition fees.

loans.name: Marefe

texts.en:
Marefe hails from the town of Batuan, Bohol. She is 26 years old with a four-year-old son.

She has rice paddies and has been engaged in farming for three years now. Her partner in life works in a private company and his income could be a great help for the family.

She is applying for a loan to buy fertilizer to have a good harvest and improve her income. Slowly, Marefe could be able to pay her obligation and continue to provide her child with a healthy diet.

In the future, Marefe is looking forward to having a better living condition by expanding her current livelihood for the welfare of her child.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer.

loans.name: Nasiyba

texts.ru: Насийба успешно погасила кредит, использовав его по назначению. Она благодарна Фонду Кива и всем, кто помог ей в финансировании. В хозяйстве Насийбы на сегодня есть корова, 5 овец и лошадь. На 1,40 Га земли выращивает  сафлор и клевер для реализации. Ежемесячный совокупный доход Насийбы составляет 16,700 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Насийба вновь обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 75,000 сом (KGS) на приобретение овец и коров. Доходы от бизнеса помогут развить бизнес и отремонтировать дом.
texts.en:
Nasiyba has successfully repaid her loan, having used it as specified. She is thankful to Kiva and to everyone who helped her with the financing. On Nasiyba's farm today, there is a cow, five sheep, and a horse. On 1.40 hectares of land, she cultivates safflower and clover for sale. Nasiyba's monthly combined income is 16,700 som (KGS). 

With the view of further developing her business, Nasiyba has again applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 75,000 som (KGS) in order to purchase sheep and cows. The funds from the business will help to develop her business, and to renovate her home.

loans.use: to purchase some sheep and cows in order to increase her herd.

loans.name: Yoweri

texts.en:
Yoweri is aged 50, a married hard-working man charged with the responsibility of taking care of seven children, all of whom attend school in Hoima, Uganda.

Yoweri ventured into the buying and selling of produce, primarily maize, rice and beans. Upon realizing a need to supplement his income, he started up a bar where he sells beer and sodas. He has always been optimistic of expansion and growth of his business to satisfy the growing demands of his customers, although he faces a strong threat of price fluctuations and unfavorable weather conditions.

He is requesting a loan to buy more maize and rice to sell.

loans.use: to buy more maize and rice to sell.

loans.name: Bualma

texts.ru: Буалма, 46 лет, есть 2 сыновей, не замужем. Образование у нее среднее, в качестве дохода для своей семьи, занимается животноводством и полеводством, стартовав 13 лет назад. Благодаря упорному труду Буалмы, на данный момент в ее хозяйстве имеется 3 коровы. На 2,0 Га земли она выращивает кукурузу. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Буалма обратилась в Банк «Бай–Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку двух коров. Доходы от кредита Буалма планирует вложить в дальнейшее расширение бизнеса.
texts.en:
Bualma is 46 years old, has two sons, and is unmarried. She has secondary education, and breeds cattle and grows crops for the family income, having started 13 years ago. Thanks to Bualma's persistent hard work, currently on her farm there are three cows. On 2.0 hectares of land, she cultivates corn. 

With the view of further developing her business, Bualma has applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 50,000 som (KGS) in order to buy two cows. Bualma plans to invest the funds from the loan in the further expansion of her business.

loans.use: to purchase two cows in order to increase her livestock headcount.

loans.name: Muner Fatima

texts.en:
MUNER FATIMA is a 30-year-old lady living with her spouse and three children in the area of Lahore, Pakistan.

She is a responsible mother until her children have reached the age of marriage. She wants to make some savings so that she can provide better living facilities to her children, but it seems impossible in the absence of a profitable source of income.

Her husbands has been driving auto rickshaws for many years; their income is sufficient to feed entire family. Her husband has to maintain the auto rickshaw body, but he does not have a sufficient amount to fix the problem.

Therefore, MUNER FATIMA requested a loan from Kiva’s field partner, BRAC Pakistan, so that her husband would be able to buy the auto rickshaw body.

She thanks Kiva and field partner, BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy a rickshaw body for her husband's transportation services.

loans.name: Andresa

texts.en:
Andresa is a 59-year-old married woman with five children. 20 years ago she started selling dried fish to help her husband in covering the needs and expenses. She resides in the town of Batuan, Bohol. She is a hard worker who is trying desperately to develop her business.

She has requested a loan from Kiva's field partner, CEVI, to buy more stock of dried fish. She would now able to maintain the inventory of her stock and attract more customers.

Andresa hopes to expand her business more in the future by opening another stall to generate a higher income and improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy more stock of dried fish.

loans.name: Ra'no

texts.ru: Раъно жена и мать одного единственного 25 летного сына. У Раъно есть красивая невестка и прекрасные внуки. Ее муж занимается мастером по ремонту домов. Раъно вместе мужем, сыном, невесткой и внуками живет в городе Худжанд. Она серьезная, честная и гостеприимная женщина. Ей 51 лет. Раъно рукодельница. Она дома занимается шитьем. Раъно сама делает ручную вышивку и шьет женскую одежду.  Она решила расширить деятельность и привлечь себе больше клиентов. Ей нужно купить больше ткани для расширения деятельности. Раъно обратилась за кредитом по причине, что у нее нет денежных средств. Она нуждается на Вашу поддержку
texts.en:
Ra'no is a wife and mother of one 25-year-old son. Ra'no has a beautiful daughter-in-law and wonderful grandchildren. Her husband works as a home repair expert. Ra'no lives with her husband, son, daughter-in-law, and grandchildren in the city Khujand. She is a serious, honest, and hospitable woman. She is 51 years old. 

Ra'no is a seamstress. She sews from home. Ra'no does embroidery by hand and sews womens' clothes herself. She has decided to expand her business and attract more clients for herself. She needs to buy more fabric in order to expand her business. Ra'no has applied for a loan because she does not have the financial resources. She needs your support.

loans.use: to buy more fabric and to expand her business.

loans.name: Milana

texts.en:
Milana is a 45-year-old married mother of four children. She works with her husband in their small convenience store.

She is acquiring a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua to pay her children's school tuition fees. The loan is part of Al Majmoua's Back to School program, designed to finance school expenses such as books, stationery, transportation, and fees for students from low income families.

Funds can be used for partial or complete payment of school expenses. By supporting this loan, you're enabling access to education for students with limited options.

Milana hopes to continue supporting her children's education and improve their living.

loans.use: to pay for her children's school tuition fees.

loans.name: Viktorya

texts.en:
Viktorya is 41 years old and she lives with her husband and two children in Sevan city. Her son is school-aged still and her daughter is already student.

Viktorya has had higher education with a specialty of chemistry. Starting from 2004 till today she has worked at the school as a teacher of chemistry. She likes her work and she does her best to attract the interest of her pupils to her subject since usually it is hard for the pupils to learn and remember it.

Now Viktorya asks for this loan of 150,000 Armenian drams, as she wants to buy a printer (she already has a computer, which she greatly uses to become aware of new information connected with her subject) and some professional literature.

loans.use: to buy a printer and some professional literature

loans.name: Ramón Alberto

texts.es: Ramón es un microempresario habitante de Barranquilla un municipio del departamento del Atlántico y en su comunidad identificó falencias de diferentes servicios y decidió crear su propio negocio con la finalidad de generar sus ingresos y mejorar la calidad de vida entre los integrantes de la comunidad. Él compro máquinas de lavado y empezó a prestar el servicio, su éxito fue tan contundente que en la actualidad su capacidad le es insuficiente y por eso está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo para comprar cuatro lavadoras, con las que podrá ampliar su oferta de servicios y los residentes del sector gozar de una mejor forma de lavado y ahorro en agua potable e incluso en detergentes. Ramón de 61 años es padre de cuatro hijos todos mayores de edad y vive con su cónyuge a quien le aporta bienestar con el fruto de su trabajo. Su meta a futuro es ampliar su capacidad de servicios adquiriendo diez lavadoras.
texts.en:
Ramón is a small business owner living in Barranquilla, a town in the Atlántico section and in his community he identified the lack of different services and decided to start his own business with the aim of generating incoming and improving his quality of life among the members of the community.

He bough washing machines and started to provide the service, his success was to overwhelming that currently his capacity is insufficient and for this reason he is applying for a Kiva loan, first financing that the Mario Santo Domingo foundation makes to buy four washing machines, with which he will be able to increase his service offering and the residents of the area will enjoy a better form of washing and saving potable water including in detergents.

Ramón is 61 years old, father of four adult children, and lives with his spouse to whose wellbeing he supports with the fruits of his labor. His future goal is to increase his service capacity by acquiring 10 washing machines.

loans.use: to buy four washing machines.

loans.name: Francis

texts.en:
Francis used the previous loan to buy land and plant bananas.

It's amazing to look at how beautifully his plantation has grown and he is a 62-year-old hardworking man who deals in food selling, specifically bananas. He has eight children and has been in this business for a period of 19 years.

He faces a problem of customers not paying on time and seasonal weather. He would like to educate his children and expand his business to other areas and also buy land and set up a modern banana plantation.

Francis intends to use the loan to buy fertilizers for his banana plantation.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for his banana plantation.

loans.name: Ivania Mercedes

texts.es:
Ivania, es una mujer muy trabajadora y dedicada, tiene treinta y siete años de edad, posee una pulpería, en la cual deja su trabajo arduo para que sea un negocio sólido. Es madre de dos pequeños, que luego de ir a la escuela le ayudan en todo lo que pueden. Inicio su negocio con un capital que le dio su esposo. Gracias a su visión de mujer comerciante, ha sabido ahorrar para siempre poder invertir en nuevos productos.
Enfocada en el crecimiento de su negocio, ella ha decidido recurrir a un préstamo de Kiva junto a MiCrédito, que le permita comprar aceite, arroz, frijoles, azúcar, maíz, entre otros artículos, en grandes cantidades. En un futuro planea hacer de su negocio una distribuidora importante de su comunidad.
texts.en:
Ivan is a very hard working, dedicated woman. She is 37 years old, and has a corner store that she works hard in to make it a stable business. She is the mother of two small children, who help her as much as they can after school. She began her business with capital her husband gave her.

Thanks to her vision as a business woman, she knows to save in order to always be able to invest in new products. Focused on the growth of her business, she has decided to seek a loan from Kiva and MiCrédito, that will permit her to buy oil, rice, beans, sugar and corn, among other products, in large quantities. In the future she plans to make her business an important distributor in her community.

loans.use: to buy oil, rice, beans, sugar and corn, among other things, in large quantities.

loans.name: Victoria

texts.en: Victoria is a maize farmer from the Chiroma village. As a Babban Gona member, Victoria is excited to have access to a trained agronomist and superior inputs that will give her the chance to achieve high yields of up to 8 MT/Ha, 5.5 times higher than the average Nigerian farmer. Before joining Babban Gona, Victoria would have had to sell her maize at harvest, when the price of maize is at its lowest, to meet her immediate cash needs. Victoria will use this loan to store the maize she harvests, enabling her to delay its sale until a later period in the season when she can obtain the best price for her maize at a premium of up to 37% higher than the market price. Thanks to the support from Babban Gona’s marketing services, Victoria no longer feels the pressure to sell her maize at low harvest prices. With the opportunity to earn up to $2000/Ha, Victoria hopes to realize better yields and plans on using her additional income to acquire more land to put into the Babban Gona program.

loans.use: to buy food and clothing, eliminating the pressure to sell maize for low prices at harvest

loans.name: Mehriniso

texts.ru: Мехринисо из города Худжанд. Ей 50 лет. Она семейная женщина. У нее двое детей. Сыновья женаты. Они работают в магазине, помогает маме в работе. Ее муж занимается водителем грузового автомобиля. Сама Мехринисо занимается торговлей деятельности. 5 лет она занимается этой виде деятельности. Она научила сыновей, как правильно общаться с клиентами и вести бизнес. Младший сын занимается продавцом, а другой перевозить продукт питания. Можно сказать это деятельность является семейной. Мехринисо решила на половине магазине продавать мужскую одежду. Она просит кредит для перевоза мужскую одежду из Турции. У нее мечта расширить торговую деятельность. Мехринисо заранее выражает свою благодарность.
texts.en:
Mehriniso is from Khujand city. She is 50 years old. She is a family woman. She has two children. Her sons are married. They work in a shop, helping their mother with her work. Her husband is a lorry driver. 

Mehriniso has a retail business. She has been in this business for five years. She taught her sons how to properly communicate with clients and conduct the business. Her younger son is a salesperson, and her other son transports food products. One could say that this is a family business. 

Mehriniso has decided to sell menswear in half of the shop. She is requesting a loan in order to transport menswear from Turkey. She has a dream of expanding her retail business. Mehriniso expresses her thanks in advance.

loans.use: to transport menswear and expand her business.

loans.name: Zuhro

texts.ru: Зухро бизнес-леди. Она живет в городе Худжанд вместе семьей. Ей 54 года. Зухро счастливая мать и бабушка. Детям 20 и 32 года. Сыновья самостоятельные и воспитанные парни. Зухро активная и умная женщина. Она в городе занимается торговлей деятельности. Она продает шампунь, гель, мыло, стиральный порошок и другие гигиеническое средство. У нее имеется большой магазин. У Зухро имеется постоянные клиенты. Зухрохочет перевозить больше товар, для увеличения товарооборот. Ей нужно денежных средств для перевоза товаров. По той причине Зухро берет кредит. Она надеется на Вашу поддержку.
texts.en:
Zuhro is a businesslady. She lives in Khujand city with her family. She is 54 years old. Zuhro is a happy mother and grandmother. Her children are 20 and 32 years old. Her sons are independent and well-brought-up chaps. 

Zuhro is an active and clever woman. She has a retail business in the city. She sells shampoo, gel, soap, laundry powder and other grooming products. She has a large shop. Zuhro has regular clients. 

Zuhro wants to transport more merchandise in order to increase her goods turnover. She needs funds for transporting merchandise. For this reason, Zuhro is taking a loan. She is hoping for your support.

loans.use: to transport merchandise for increasing her goods turnover.

loans.name: Nazik

texts.en:
Nazik lives in Sevan city of the Gegharkunik region with her beloved husband. Their two daughters are already married and they live with their families. Their son works abroad. Nazik’s husband works as the warden at a school, while Nazik is busy caring for her farm and cattle.

On her farm she has cows, calves, sheep and chickens. She makes very good cheese and butter and sells it with her farm milk, macun (a national dairy product), meat and eggs. She mentions that she thanks God she has no health problems and all the work on the farm she manages with great pleasure and care. Her customers are mainly her neighbors, who like the quality and taste of her farm products.

This loan Nazik asks as she wants to make her farm richer with cattle; she will purchase one cow and a calf with the help of her Kiva loan.

loans.use: to purchase one cow and a calf to make her farm richer with cattle.

loans.name: Mariam

texts.en:
Mariam is a divorced mother of one child who attends school. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are school fees and household consumables.

For over three years she has operated an open air food selling business, selling from home to her neighbours and passersby. She faces a major challenge of seasonality in her place of business.

With the Kshs 10,000, she wants to purchase bundles of wheat flour, maize flour, tea leaves and cooking fat.

She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase bundles of wheat flour, maize flour, tea leaves and cooking fat.

loans.name: Aida Sofia

texts.es:
Llevar las noticias al día a día, hacer proyectos sociales o comunicar una idea mediante distintos medios, son algunas de las cualidades que sedujeron a Aida a estudiar Comunicación Social. Anteriormente ella había solicitado un préstamo con el cual pudo comprar una computadora y una cámara, que le sirvió de mucho para poner en práctica sus conocimientos, de manera que agradece a todas las personas que le apoyaron con ese crédito. Actualmente se encuentra estudiando el quinto año de la licenciatura, donde ha aprendido de todo y le ha permitido poner sus conocimientos en práctica trabajando en una ONG.
Aida cuenta con el apoyo económico de su madre, quien trabaja en la alcaldía, y de su padre, quien es taxista. La motivación que le proporcionan su padre y madre la han hecho convertirse en una de las mejores alumnas de su generación. En estos momentos ella solicita un nuevo préstamo para pagar un curso de inglés comunicativo, idioma que considera de suma importancia en la actualidad para el desarrollo profesional y personal, más ella que trabaja en una organización extranjera. En sus metas está perfeccionar su inglés y finalizar con su carrera.
texts.en:
Bringing the news into daily life, working on social projects and communicating an idea through different media are some of the qualities that led Aida to study Social Communication. She previously requested a loan with which she was able to buy a computer and a camera, which were very helpful for putting her knowledge into practice, so she is grateful to everyone who supported her with that loan. She is currently in her fifth year of studying for her bachelor's degree, in which she has learned about everything and which has allowed her to put her knowledge into practice by working for an NGO.

Aida is financially supported by her mother, who works in city government, and her father, who is a taxi driver. Being motivated by her father and mother has turned her into one of the best students of her generation. 

She is now requesting a new loan to pay for a course on communicative English, a language she considers to be very important for professional and personal development these days, and all the more so since she works for a foreign organization. Her goals include improving her English and completing her degree.

loans.use: to pay for a course on communicative English.

loans.name: María Elena

texts.es:
Elena, de 21 años de edad, estudio hasta octavo grado, se acompaño a los 15 años de edad y su pareja se dedica a la agricultura y tiene dos hijos.

Elena, desde hace 5 años se dedica a la agricultura junto a su pareja, fue él quien le enseño a sembrar maíz, frijoles y pipianes, sus cultivos están a una distancia de 1 kilómetro de su casa y el recorrido lo realiza en bicicleta, ellos se levantan a las 4:30 a.m. para elaborar el desayuno y luego ir a dejar sus hijos donde su mamá para que se los cuide, mientras ellos trabajan 6 horas en el campo. 

El crédito lo necesita para comprar fertilizantes para sembrar 3,500 metros cuadrados de pipianes.

Elena, sueña con ver a sus hijos graduarse de la universidad y poder construir su propia casa, porque donde viven es de una pariente de ella.
texts.en:
Elena is 21 years old. She went to school until the eighth grade. She has been with her partner since she was 15. He works in agriculture, and they have two children. For 5 years Elena has worked in agriculture with her partner. He taught her how to plant corn, rice and squash. Their fields are 1 kilometer from their house, a trip they make on bicycle. They get up at 4:30 a.m. to make breakfast, and leave the children with her mother to care for, while they work 6 hours in the fields.

They need a loan to buy fertilizers to plant 3,500 square meters of squash. Elena dreams of seeing her children graduate from college, and of being able to build her own house, since they live with a relative.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers to plant 3,500 square meters of  squash.

loans.name: Jameela

texts.en:
JAMEELA is a 45-year-old housewife. She lives in Lahore, Pakistan. She is a mother of three children.

Her husband owns a fruit shop in the market, which is the only source of income for the family. He sells apples, bananas and oranges in his shop. Presently he is interested in offering more variety to his customers, which will help him to increase his net income and savings as well. However, due to the lack of money, he finds it difficult.

Therefore his wife, JAMEELA, has requested a loan amount from Kiva's partner BRAC Pakistan so that she can help her husband to purchase a variety of fruits from the field and sell them in the market at a profitable price.

Her husband wants to grow his business in the future with the profit.

JAMEELA is very thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakiatan.

loans.use: to buy seasonal and fresh fruits in bulk for her husband's fruit business.

loans.name: Ishkhan

texts.en:
Ishkhan is 34 years old and he lives in Tsovagyugh village of Gegharkunik region. He lives here with his smaller brother. In their native village, Ishkhan’s brother greatly helps him in his farming work.

On his farm Ishkhan has cows, sheep, pigs, a bull and chickens. This young man is already skilled in making very good dairy products from his farm milk, such as a macun (a national dairy product), cheese and butter. He also sells meat to many city butchers who give their orders to him beforehand. Ishkhan also sells a lot of potatoes cultivated on his land.

Now with his first Kiva loan, Ishkhan decided to buy one more cow, increasing the number of his farm cattle, and also fodder for his farm cattle.

loans.use: to buy one more cow to increase the number of his farm cattle and also fodder for his farm cattle.

loans.name: Roziya

texts.ru: Счастливая и веселая женщина Розия. Ей 46 лет. Она из района Шахринав. Розия замужем и мать двоих детей. Ее муж находится на заработках в Российской Федерации. Дети живут вместе матерью. Розия сейчас кормить детей сама, по причине что его муж сейчас редко оправить деньги домой. Она на рынке продает фрукты. Розия почти с детства занимается торговлей деятельности. Уже 21 лет она продвигает свой бизнес. Она решила расширить деятельность и увеличить доход. Розия собирается, перевозит фрукты на продажу. Ей нужно денежных средств для перевоза фрукты.  С такими планами она обратилась за кредитом.
texts.en:
This happy and cheerful woman is Roziya. She is 46 years old. She is from Shahrinav area. Roziya is married and has two children. Her husband is working in Russia. Their children live with their mother. Roziya is now supporting her children on her own, because her husband now rarely sends money home. She sells fruit at a market. 

Roziya has been in the retail business almost her whole life. She has been pushing forward with her business for 21 years. She has decided to expand her business and increase her income. Roziya intends to transport fruit for sale. She needs funds for transporting the fruit. With this plan, she has applied for a loan.

loans.use: to transport fruit and expand her business.

loans.name: Mariza

texts.ru: Мариза, 46 лет, в разводе, многодетная мать 3 детей. Образование-высшее, с 2002 года в качестве дохода для своей большой и дружной семьи она занимается животноводством, в хозяйстве есть 3 коровы, 3 теленка, 10 овец. Для содержания скота есть все условия. Ежемесячный доход Маризы составляет около 20,000 сом (KGS), этих средств не хватает на достойное содержание семьи и воспитание детей школьников. Поэтому, в целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Мариза обратилась в Банк «Бай-Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку скота и корма. Доходы от кредита она планирует вложить в дальнейшее расширение бизнеса и улучшение благосостояния семьи.
texts.en:
Mariza is 46 years old, divorced, and has three children. She has higher education, and from 2002 she has been breeding livestock in order to provide income for her large and close-knit family. On her farm there are three cows, three calves, and ten sheep. Everything is provided for supporting the livestock. 

Mariza's monthly income is about 20,000 som (KGS), and these funds are not enough to support her family and bring up her schoolgoing children. Thus, with the view of further expanding her business, Mariza has applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 100,000 som (KGS) in order to buy livestock and feed. She plans to invest the funds from the loan in the further expansion of her bsuiness, and improving her family's wellbeing.

loans.use: to buy some livestock and feed for it, in order to help bolster her income.

loans.name: Epifania

texts.en:
Epifania is a hardworking mother from Labo, Aloran, Misamis Occidental. She is 67 years old and a businesswoman who makes copra. She buys whole coconuts for this.

Epifania has signed up for her membership with the cooperative to gain access to insurance and credit.

She applied for a loan to buy whole coconuts for making copra.

Epifania hopes to succeed in this business to continuously provide for her family.

loans.use: to buy whole coconuts to make copra (dried coconut meat used for oil production).

loans.name: Pablito

texts.en:
In the year 2009, Pablito learned of Paglaum MPC and the financial assistance it gives to start-ups. He is a security guard and a farmer in Labo, Aloran; he tried his luck and borrowed a loan to jump start his corn production. After several months, he was able to return his borrowed capital.

To this day, Pablito feels he owes his good fortune to the Cooperative for having trusted him with the money he used for his business.

Recently, he availed a loan to purchase farm inputs and fertilizer for the next cropping season.

Pablito wishes to sustain his business and be able to supply corn in the neighboring towns.

loans.use: to purchase farm inputs and fertilizer

loans.name: Wilma

texts.en:
Wilma makes a living through her retail business. She runs a sari-sari store (convenience store) in Poblacion II, Oroquieta City, and earns a promising income to support her family.

She signed up for her membership with PMPC to gain access to capital. She wants to increase her inventory. Now, she availed a loan to restock her store, with items like canned goods, oil, and soy sauce to sell.

Wilma hopes to sustain her business and dreams to send all her children to school.

loans.use: to restock her store with items like canned goods, oil, and soy sauce.

loans.name: Remedios

texts.en:
As a married parent of three children, Remedios works hard to support her family.

She has a butcher shop business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from pig fattening.

Remedios is borrowing PHP 9,000 through NWTF to buy more chicken meat to sell at her food stall.

Remedios has been sustaining her business activities through her past two loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more chicken meat to sell at her food stall.

loans.name: Gulmairam

texts.ru: Гульмайрам, 45 лет, замужем, мать 3 детей. У нее средне-специальное образование. В качестве дохода для семьи, она занимается животноводством и полеводством, начав бизнес в 1996 году с 8,000 сом (KGS). Супруг и дети активно помогают по хозяйству. На сегодня в хозяйстве есть 3 коровы, на 2,04 Га земли выращивает многолетние травы для заготовки и реализации сена. Также ведет садоводческую деятельность, выращивая плодовые фруктовые деревья. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Гульмайрам обратилась в Банк «Бай – Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 60,000 сом (KGS) на покупку овец для откорма и реализации, также на ремонт сарая для скота. Доходы от кредита Гульмайрам планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение ее бизнеса и обучение сыновей.
texts.en:
Gulmairam is 45 years old, married, and has three children. She has specialised secondary education. She breeds livestock and grows crops for her family's income, having started the business in 1996 with 8,000 som (KGS). Her husband and children actively help around the farm. Today on her farm there are three cows, and on 2.04 hectares of land she cultivates perennial herbs for feed and selling hay. She also runs a gardening business, cultivating fruit. 

With the view of further developing her business, Gulmairam has applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 60,000 som (KGS) in order to buy sheep for fattening and resale, and also to renovate the barn for the livestock. Gulmairam plans to invest the funds from the loan in the further augmentation of her business, and in her sons' education.

loans.use: to buy sheep for fattening and resale.

loans.name: Naheel

texts.en: Greetings from Palestine. Naheel is a 18-year-old single lady from Nablus city. She is a student in the university where she studies Arabic Language. Her father works in small company in the city where he gets a low and unstable income. His income is barely covers all the family needs. Naheel wants to take the BA degree and find a job in the future to support her family. Naheel  took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help her to pay the university fees for the first semester. By taking this loan, Naheel will be able to register in the university and pay part of the urgent expenses she has. Naheel appears in the photo. Naheel  is very grateful to everyone who helps her to achieve success in his study with this loan.

loans.use: to pay the university installments for this semester.

loans.name: Erlinda

texts.en:
Erlinda is 46 years old, married, and had three children. She is selling fruits and vegetables within their village using her bicycle. She patiently offers her merchandise in order to get good profits to use for education and revolving capital.

She would like to improve her sales and profits, so she is asking for a loan of P11,000 to buy eggplants, tomatoes, cabbages and squash to sell.

She promises to continue selling vegetables and pay back her loan in full.

loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables to sell

loans.name: Leonardo

texts.es: Leonardo es un hombre que a sus 54 años de edad aun continua buscando la manera de ganarse la vida, el desde muy joven se ha preocupado por los niveles de contaminación con que cuenta el país, por lo que desde hace varios años se dedica a la recolección que materiales reciclables en sus tiempos libres, ya que durante la semana presta sus servicios en una empresa municipal. Leonardo vive muy feliz junto a su esposa y sus dos hijas de 16 y 7 años y dos hijos de 19 y 14 años de edad. Leonardo desea construir un cuarto para la cocina ya que el que tiene es de lámina deteriorada, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: cemento, arena, lámina, grava y hierro para construir el cuarto para la cocina y tener un lugar adecuado para preparar sus alimentos.
texts.en:
Leonardo is a man who, at the age of 54, is still looking for a way to make a living. From a very young age, he has been concerned about the pollution levels in his country. Therefore, he has spent his free time for the past several years collecting recyclable materials. During the week, he works for a company in the city. Leonardo lives very happily with his wife, his two daughters ages 16 and 7, and his two sons ages 19 and 14. 

Leonardo wishes to build a room for the kitchen, since the one that he currently has is made of deteriorated metal sheets. For this reason, he is requesting a loan from FUSAI to buy cement, sand, metal sheets, gravel, and iron to build a room for the kitchen so that he can have a suitable place to prepare food.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, metal sheets, gravel, and iron to build a room for the kitchen so that he can have a suitable place to prepare food.

loans.name: Jasmin

texts.en:
Jasmin has banana farm in Oroquieta city. This is her primary source of income for her family.

Jasmin makes it a point to have good land preparation to have the maximum yield and will have a good income.

Recently, she needed an amount to pay for irrigation costs, which she borrowed from Paglaum MPC.

Jasmin wishes to sustain her business and be able to supply bananas in the neighboring towns.

loans.use: to pay for labor for irrigation to soften tillage pans.

loans.name: Emily

texts.en:
Emily has a banana farm in Oroquieta City. This is her primary source of income for her family. Emily makes it a point to have good land preparation to have maximum yield and good income.

Recently, she needed an amount to pay for land preparation, like plowing & harrowing, and to purchase a good variety of banana sprouts for healthier, heavier and more produce. This amount she borrowed from Paglaum MPC.

Emily wishes to sustain her business and to be able to supply bananas in the neighboring towns.

loans.use: to pay for land preparation, like plowing & harrowing, and to purchase a good variety of banana sprouts for healthier, heavier and more produce.

loans.name: Elsy Mabel

texts.es:
Elsy, de 28 años de edad, estudio hasta segundo grado, está acompañada, su pareja es jornalero y sus hijos van a la escuela.

Elsy, se dedica a sembrar maíz y maicillo, el negocio lo aprendió con su pareja; pero aparte de eso también trabaja en los oficios domésticos, la parcela en donde siembran se encuentra a 20 minutos de su domicilio. 

Elsy, necesita el préstamo para comprar insumos agrícola para sembrar maíz.

Ella siempre ha soñado con comprar una parcela de terreno, para no tener que andar alquilando.
texts.en:
Elsy is 28 years old, was in school until second grade, is in a relationship, her partner is a day laborer and her children go to school.

Elsy makes a living growing corn and sorghum, a business she learned with her partner; but apart from that she also does domestic work, the plot where she plants is 20 minutes from her house.

Elsy needs the loan to buy agricultural supplies to plant corn.

She has always dreamed of buying a plot of land, so she doesn't have to keep renting.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies to plant corn.

loans.name: Virginia

texts.en:
Virginia is an active member of Paglaum MPC who enjoys all the perks of being a member. She is 65 years old, a widow with adult children. Virginia is busy running her furniture operation and tilling her own land; both business ventures were supported by the co-op.

Virginia said she's secure financially, knowing she can always turn to the cooperative, but she also wants to be prepared for unprecedented life events, so she has life insurance through the co-op. Now her one-year life insurance is expiring, and she will use this loan to pay for renewal. Virginia believes that it is better to be prepared than to be held by the neck by unexpected circumstances.

loans.use: to renew her family's life insurance.

loans.name: Ibraheem

texts.en: Ibraheem is a 31-years-old single young man from the city of Khan Younis. His father is an employee in the public sector and earns a low and unstable income. This income is barely enough to cover all the family's needs. Ibraheem is a mathematics student in the university. He wants to earn a BA degree and find a job to help his family with their expenses. Ibraheem will use the loan to buy a new laptop for his studies. By taking this loan, Ibraheem will be able to do his homework and reports easily.

loans.use: to buy a new laptop.

loans.name: Rabaa

texts.en: Greetings from Palestine. Rabaa is a 20-year-old single lady from Tubas near Nablus city. She is a student in the university where she studies Business Administration. Her father works in small company in the city where he gets a low and unstable income. His income barely covers all the family needs.Rabaa wants to take the BA degree and find a job in the future to support her family. Rabaa took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help her to pay the university fees for the first semester. By taking this loan, Rabaa will be able to register in the university and pay part of the urgent expenses she has.Rabaa appears in the photo.  Rabaa is very grateful to everyone who helps her to achieve success in her study with this loan.

loans.use: to pay the university fees for the first semester.

loans.name: Madrona

texts.en:
Madrona signed up for membership with PMPC and availed herself of the needed capital to start up a sari-sari (general) store business. She is thankful for the capital PMPC extends to a small-time borrower like her.

Madrona has been able to turn the tide in her favor and makes good sales these days. She wants to take advantage of her good fortune. Recently, she took out a loan to restock her store with basic commodities like canned goods, oil, and soy sauce. In the future, she hopes to save enough for family emergencies and to continuously support her family.

loans.use: to restock her store with basic commodities like canned goods, oil, and soy sauce.

loans.name: Shiela Mae

texts.en:
Shiela Mae is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a fish vending business in the Philippines. She is borrowing PHP 30,000 through NWTF in order to buy more seafood to sell to customers.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business. NWTF is relisting Shiela Mae's business profile in support of her efforts to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy more seafood to sell.

loans.name: Rocel

texts.en:
Rocel is 49 years old and single. She is in the agricultural business, fattening pigs in the Philippines.

Rocel has requested a 5,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy feed, vaccines, vitamins and other supplies to raise her pigs. She has been in this business for one year now and has borrowed twice in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Rocel would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed, vaccines, vitamins and other supplies to raise her pigs.

loans.name: Rogelie

texts.en:
Rogelie is a 30-year-old married mother of two children, both in school She is a very hard-working entrepreneur.

Rogelie has a rice retailing business in the Philippines. Rogelie requested a PHP 9,000 loan through NWTF to buy more sacks of rice to sell.

Rogelie has been in this business for five years. She would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more sacks of rice to sell.

loans.name: Sandra Aracely

texts.es:
Sandra, de 34 años de edad, estudio hasta quinto grado, está soltera, tiene 2 hijos, pero solo uno estudia.
 
Sandra, se dedica a sembrar maíz y frijol desde hace 8 años, decidió dedicarse a este oficio porque lo aprendió de sus padres desde pequeña y era una fuente para generar ingresos para la familia; la parcela donde siembra está a 15 minutos de su casa y paga mozos para que le ayuden a sembrar.

Sandra, necesita el préstamo para comprar insumos agrícolas como abono, pesticidas y fertilizantes para sembrar maíz y maicillo.

Ella sueña con hacer una casa de bloque, porque en la que vive es de lámina.
texts.en:
Sandra is 34 years old, was in school until 5th grade, is single, has 2 children, but only one is in school.

Sandra has made a living growing corn and beans for 8 years, she chose this profession because she learned from her parents when she was young and it was a source of income for the family; the plot where she grows is 15 minutes from her house and she pays youths to help her sow.

Sandra needs the loan to buy agriculture supplies such as manure, pesticides, and fertilizers to grow corn and sorghum.

She building a house of blocks, because the one she lives in is made of sheet metal.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies such as manure, pesticides, and fertilizers to plant corn and sorghum.

loans.name: Albertina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “PADRE URRACA”; la socia sigue  trabajando para una empresa pública y a la compra y venta de terrenos, la socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas, la socia es una persona responsable siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra de un electrodoméstico.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the communal bank "Padre Urraca". She continues to work for a public company and also buys and sells plots of land.

The member is grateful for the loan that she is receiving, and she promises to make her payments according to the established terms. She is a responsible person, and it is in this way that the member moves her family forward.

She is requesting a loan to buy an appliance.

loans.use: to buy an appliance.

loans.name: Lolita

texts.en:
Lolita is 75 years old. She is known in the Talairon, Oroquieta City area for her sari-sari (variety) store. She is actively participating in the various programs and services that the coop offers.

Lolita hopes to live comfortably, with a decent house. So, she applied for a loan to purchase plywood, nails, and sticks for repairing her house.

She hopes to maintain her membership in good-standing, with a good repayment record. It matters that she has been given a priority as a microfinance member of Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative (PMPC). This is what she is thankful for, when all her financing needs of her retailing business are supported by PMPC.

loans.use: to purchase plywood, nails, and sticks for her house.

loans.name: Mukta

texts.en:
Mukta is 48 years old and hails from Bolangir district of Odisha. She lives in her own house with her life companion and her two children aged 17 and 18 years old. She is a hard-working woman who due to her friendliness has many customers who visit her business selling fruit and vegetables. One factor that concerns her is that she does not have access to a hygienic latrine at her home. Therefore, Mukta is requesting a loan in the amount of 15,000 INR. She will use the loan amount to install a toilet in her home so that she would no longer have to depend on an open field for defecation.
This intelligent woman believes that it is the right time to get a Kiva loan with People's Forum. She will invest it in finishing construction of toilet by buying tile, cement etc. She is dedicated to improving the health of her family, and that is why she is making these changes, which also help to stop ground contamination.

loans.use: to install a toilet in her home

loans.name: Eyling Margarita

texts.es:
Eyling es una joven inspirada por salir adelante, a sus 24 años de edad es madre de un hijo de tan solo dos años, quien es su principal motivador de su día a día. Esta joven luchadora, decidió estudiar una de las carreras que en la actualidad sigue estereotipada por los demás como una que solo estudian los hombres, Ingeniería en telemática, mostrando que las mujeres están listas para este mundo de software, redes y computadoras.
Para ella elegir está carrera fue fácil, pues además de atraerle la computación, sabe que la innovación de esta ingeniería la llevaría a tener mejores oportunidades de empleo. Por lo que Eyling está dando lo mejor de ella, estudiando ya el cuarto año de la carrera, de manera que solicita un préstamo para comprar una computadora y así tener la herramienta básica para realizar sus trabajos. Afortunadamente ella cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo, quien trabaja en seguridad, y de su padre. En un futuro desea conseguir trabajo acorde a lo estudiado.
texts.en:
Eyling is a youth who is inspired to get ahead. At 24 years of age she is the mother of a son, only two years old, who is her main motivation day by day. This young fighter decided to study one of the fields that today is stereotyped by others as one that only men study, Telecommunications Engineering, showing that women are ready for this world of software, internet and computers.

For her to choose this course was easy. Besides being attracted by computers, she knows that the innovation involved in this engineering will bring her better employment opportunities. So she is giving her all, now studying in her fourth year. She is requesting a loan to buy a computer and thus have the basic tool to carry out her work. Fortunately she has the support of her husband who works in security and of her father. In the future she wants to get a job related to her studies.

loans.use: to buy a computer.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy four sacks of rice to add to her kiosk stock.

loans.name: Jennifer

texts.en:
Jennifer is a strong-willed man who will do anything for his family. He is 39 years old, married, and lives in Lao Sta. Cruz, Plaridel, Misamis Occidental. He operates a hog raising business, which is primarily financed by Paglaum MPC and which gives him a quarterly income of approximately PHP 25,000, a sufficient sum to meet the needs of his family.

Recently, Jennifer took another loan of PHP 30,000 to buy piglets and purchase bags of animal feed.

loans.use: to buy piglets and purchase bags of animal feed.

loans.name: Emma Flora

texts.en:
Emma Flora has switched from selling "longganisa" (processed meat) to selling ice candy (processed fruit salad). Her business is doing well after she doubled her time perfecting her own ice candy recipe. With her husband's help, she has maximized her profits and kept pursuing her goals for the good of her family. Today, Emma Flora is able to help others do a retailing business on her ice candy, and they were also able to earn for their own families.

The reason why she has availed another loan from PMPC is to purchase milk, a variety of fruits, sugar, cellophane, and flavorings for her ice candy business.

loans.use: to purchase milk, a variety of fruits, sugar, cellophane, and flavorings.

loans.name: Arsenia

texts.en: Arsenia is a hardworking mother who earns through her farming activities. She is a full-fledged member of PMPC and enjoys the benefits of insurance and financial assistance. Recently, she applied for a loan to purchase bags of cement and hollow blocks. She is on her way to renovating her house. She wishes to live comfortably with her family.

loans.use: to purchase bags of cement and hollow blocks

loans.name: Adelaida

texts.en:
Adelaida is a hardworking woman entrepreneur with seven children, three of whom are in school.

She runs a buy-and-sell charcoal business in the Philippines and requested a PHP 26,000 loan through NWTF to buy charcoal to sell.

She industriously earns additional income through other business ventures like farming rice. She successfully paid back her previous loan, and now she has requested an additional loan to further build her business.

Adelaida dreams that one day she will be able to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy charcoal to sell for her business.

loans.name: Maria Cecilia

texts.en:
Maria Cecilia is 49 years old and married and has six children. Five of her children are enrolled in school.

Maria Cecilia is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. Maria Cecilia requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy medicines and vaccines for her pigs.

Maria Cecilia has been raising pigs for two years now, and has borrowed five times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Maria Cecilia would like to save enough money to expand her business and continue to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy medicines and vaccines for her pigs.

loans.name: Robelyn

texts.en:
Robelyn is a 31-year-old married woman with three children, two of whom are currently in school. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur.

Robelyn has a tailoring business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 18,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy cloth, thread and needles and to maintain her sewing machine.

Robelyn has been in this business for 10 years. She would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy cloth, thread, and needles and to maintain her sewing machine.

loans.name: Rafael

texts.en: Rafael is a 36-year-old, married father of 5 children who works hard to support his family. He works in security at a company. Even though the family works very hard, it can be difficult for him to afford the cost of his son's education. This loan of $600 will allow Rafael to help his son continue his study in senior high school. He will use the loan to pay for registration, textbooks, and school supplies. Rafael loves his son very much and hopes that his son will be able to work in future.

loans.use: to pay for registration, textbooks, and school supplies.

loans.name: Eveling Mercedes

texts.es:
El don de servir fue el motor principal de Eveling para estudiar la carrera de medicina.  A sus 32 años de edad, esta madre soltera de dos pequeños de dos y cuatro años de edad. Cuenta con una sonrisa muy marcada en sus labios lo feliz y lo orgullosa que se siente de estar en quinto año de esta carrera de la cual se siente muy apasionada. 
En la actualidad ella se está desempeñando como médico en un hospital, donde se relaciona con distintos extranjeros que llegan, por lo que le pareció de suma importancia aprender otro idioma. De manera que solicitó un préstamo para pagar un curso de inglés y para comprar una computadora. Esto le permitirá facilitar los canales de comunicación y aprender de ellos y viceversa. En sus planes está realizar una especialidad en pediatría.
texts.en:
The gift of serving was Eveling's primary motive in studying medicine. At 32 years old, she is a single mother of two small children, 2 and 4 years old. She has a very distinct smile on her lips, because she is happy and proud to be in the fifth year of her studies, which makes her very enthusiastic.

She is currently working as a doctor in a hospital, where she comes into contact with various foreigners who arrive. Therefore, it seems of utmost importance to her to learn another language. For that reason, she seeks a loan to pay for an English course and to buy a computer. This will allow her to access the channels of communication and to learn from them, and vice versa. She has plans to specialize in pediatrics.

loans.use: to pay for an English course.

loans.name: Meyling  Ivette

texts.es:
La responsabilidad y el apego al crecimiento personal y profesional de Meyling, la ha ayudado a convertirse en una de las mejores de la carrera de Ingeniería Civil. A sus 24 años de edad miró el potencial que posee por esta carrera de gran demanda  en el país. 
Por otro lado, Meyling se siente muy agradecida por la vida y el apoyo que tiene de parte de su padre, quien trabaja en una fundaciones y por las remesas que le mandan otros familiares para poder llegar al quinto año de la ingeniería. En estos momentos solicita un préstamo para pagar un curso de inglés, idioma que considera que trae grandes oportunidades laborales. En sus planes está crear su propia empresa y brindar muchos empleos.
texts.en:
Meyling's responsibility and adherence to personal and professional growth have helped her to make herself one of the best in her Civil Engineering program. At 24 years old, she saw the potential she had for this career in high demand throughout the country. Separately, Meyling feels very grateful for life and the support that she has from her father, who works at a foundation, and for the remittances other family members send her so that she can make it to the fifth year of engineering.

Currently she seeks a loan to pay for an English course, a language she believes will bring her big work opportunities. Within her plans is to create her own business and offer lots of jobs.

loans.use: to pay for an English course.

loans.name: Jeton

texts.en: Jeton is a return client who is requesting a third loan from Kiva. His first loan was to purchase a milk cow, which helped his family to reduce their cost of living by using the products for their own consumption as well as selling for a profit. His second loan was to install a water system in the stable and purchase guano to plant corn and wheat and further increase his income. Now, Jeton has started working in construction, completing facades on homes and buildings. He has a lot of clients and demands for his services and is need of a loan to purchase a new machine to do the facade work. This loan will also help to continue to help his family's quality of life and save for his children's education. As a loyal client, Jeton appreciates all of the help he has been given.

loans.use: to purchase a new machine to do the facade work

loans.name: Marinnho

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “PADRE URRACA”; el socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de snack, el socio agradece el préstamo mediante este medio y del mismo modo se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo estipulado, él socio es una persona responsable y empeñoso, él socio  a la vez es  docente en una de las universidades de la ciudad del Cusco, él socio desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
EL socio solicita el préstamo para la compra de gaseosas, chopcolates, tortas entre otros.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the “PADRE URRACA” communal bank. He combines his daily activities with his snack food business. He is grateful for the loan through this medium and at the same time he promises to comply with the payment of his installments in the established time. He is a responsible and diligent person. He also works as a professor at one of the universities of Cusco. He wants to continue working in this way to continue to support his family.

The member is requesting the loan to buy soft drinks, chopcolates and sandwiches amongst others.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks, Chopcolates and sandwiches amongst others.

loans.name: Ana Raquel

texts.es: Ana es una emprendedora de 25 años que complementa sus labores en el hogar con la administración de su negocio de café internet, el cual  se ha convertido en una buena fuente de  ingresos para su familia, actividad que inició promovida por su cónyuge y que ha tenido muy buena acogida por los habitantes del sector.  Ella reside en compañía de su cónyuge en un barrio de Barranquilla y cuenta con dos años en su café internet ofreciendo los servicios de navegación, impresión, transcripción entre otros, a partir de las 8 a.m. hasta las 8 p.m., y en el mismo local oferta productos misceláneos, papelería y llamadas a todos los operadores nacionales.  En la actualidad está aplicando a su primer credikiva que actualmente tramita con la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo para invertir en artículos de papelería y detalles para toda ocasión.  Ella sueña con remodelar su local comercial con equipos nuevos y con todas las comodidades que generen un crecimiento continuo del negocio, con unos ingresos que le permitan a largo plazo, remodelar y ampliar su vivienda.
texts.en:
Ana is a 25 year old entrepreneur, who complements her work in the home with the administration of an internet café, which she has turned into a good source of income for her family. She began this work at the suggestion of her husband, and has had very good reception from those who live in her area. She lives in a neighborhood of Barranquilla, and has two years in her internet café, offering services of internet searches, printing, and word processing, among other things, from 8:00 a.m. until 8:00 p.m. In the same locale she sells miscellaneous products, paper goods, and calls to all the national operators.

Currently she is applying for her first Kiva loan, that is being administered with the Mario Santo Domingo Foundation, to invest in paper goods and gifts for all occasions. She dreams of remodeling her commercial locale with new systems and all the conveniences to generate continuous growth of her business, with income that will permit her, in the long term, to remodel and expand her home.

loans.use: to invest in paper products and gifts for all occasions.

loans.name: Warlito

texts.en: Warlito is 72 years old and married with adult children. He is from Talairon, Oroquieta City. He is a retired government employee and also an active member of Paglaum MPC wherein he avails himself of various financial assistance. Now, to pay for his hospital bills he asks for a loan from the cooperative.

loans.use: to pay his hospital bills.

loans.name: Shiringul

texts.ru: Это Ширингул. Ей 34 лет. Она жительница района Пяндж. Ширингул замужем и мать четверых детей. Дети учатся в средней школе.  Ее муж занимается животноводством. Ширингул занимается сельскохозяйственной деятельностью. Она ухаживает за детьми, ведет домашнее хозяйство и одновременно занимается выращиванием скота. Ширингул на все успевает.
